snippet: Ido Leffler, co-founder of Yes To, a natural skin and hair care product line based in San Francisco, learned an unexpected lesson about what not to carry through customs.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features Yes To co-founder Ido Leffler discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: Ido Leffler, co-founder of Yes To, a natural skin and hair care product line based in San Francisco, learned an unexpected lesson about what not to carry through customs.

headline.seo: A Flier’s Encounter With the Australian Customs Service
headline.main: Why I Don’t Fly With Anyone Else’s Clothes
headline.print_headline: Why I Don’t Fly With Anyone Else’s Clothes
